name: Space Harvest II
description:
Space Harvest II is an old-fashioned isometric real-time strategy game for iPad.

FINALLY – the sequel to the 3rd-best ultra-realistic interplanetary fungus harvesting simulator the galaxy has been waiting for!

* Conquer the universe in the name of the Emperor in this bonkers real-time space strategy game!
* Explore strange alien worlds in search of precious mushrooms!
* Do battle with robot warlords across 8 challenging campaign missions with 3 difficulty settings!
* Build your base and spread your power across the map!
* 10 different unit types, each with its own strengths and weaknesses!
* Study detailed post-mission reports and try to beat your best time!
* Custom game mode lets you play the game your way against a variety of AI levels!
* 18 tricky (and not so tricky) Game Center achievements to unlock!
* Gorgeous high-resolution retina graphics (iPad 4 and later) with real-time lighting!
* Stunning music that adapts to conditions in the game!
* Amazing positional sound effects and atmospheric ambient soundtrack!
* Online Help, Tech-Guide and Tutorial all included!
* A super indie space strategy game 5 years in the making - built from the ground up for iPad!

Also available for Mac in the Mac App Store!

This game does not include in-app purchases.
